name: (Don't) Keep Working
description:
Made for the GDevelop Weekend Jam #2: Mobile Edition! This is as functional as I could make it in the time allotted, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless. 

(Don't) Keep Working is the first game I've finished for a game jam, and it revolves around a simple premise:

Playing minigames while at work.

You'll receive messages from your boss when he's close by, but fail to turn off your computer in time and you'll be fired!

You can also find this on Liluo.io: Here!
